defined_tags.description: No dietary restrictions; eats all foods
Excludes all animal-derived products
No meat or seafood; allows dairy/eggs
Seafood allowed; no poultry or red meat
Prepared with halal-certified ingredients and processes
Meets kosher certification requirements; supervised sourcing and preparation
Braai, bunny chow, bobotie, chakalaka, pap and samp with peri-peri or chutney heat
Burgers, BBQ ribs or pulled pork, fried chicken, mac & cheese, chili, casseroles, subs, wings, hearty dinner salads
Tacos, burritos, enchiladas, quesadillas, pozole, chilaquiles, rice and bean bowls with corn masa, salsas, chiles, lime
Jerk chicken or pork, curry goat, oxtail stew, rice and peas, plantains, roti; allspice, thyme, scotch bonnet heat
Ceviche, lomo saltado, feijoada, moqueca, asado plates, arepas, empanadas with ají peppers, chimichurri, rice and beans
Pastas, risotto, pizza, parmigiana, minestrone; tomato, basil, olive oil, Parmigiano-centered dishes
Bistro braises like coq au vin or boeuf bourguignon, quiche, ratatouille, steak frites; butter and wine sauces, Provençal herbs
Souvlaki, gyros, moussaka, spanakopita, Greek salads; lemon, oregano, feta, olive oil, yogurt, pita accompaniments
Kebabs, köfte, pide, lahmacun, dolma, meze spreads; yogurt sauces with sumac, Aleppo pepper, pomegranate molasses
Shawarma or kofta, falafel, hummus and mezze, pilafs, fattoush; tahini, za’atar, sumac, saffron, warm flatbreads
Tagines, couscous platters, chermoula fish, harira soup; cumin, coriander, cinnamon, preserved lemon, harissa spice
Curries, biryani, dal, tandoori grills, chaat, naan or roti, dosa; garam masala, cumin, turmeric
Stir-fries, fried rice, chow mein, dumplings, hot pot, mapo tofu; soy, vinegar, ginger, garlic, five-spice or Sichuan pepper
Sushi and sashimi, ramen, udon, tempura, katsu, donburi, yakitori; dashi, miso, soy, yuzu, meticulous presentation
Bulgogi or galbi, bibimbap, kimchi stew, soft tofu jjigae, japchae; gochujang, gochugaru, sesame oil, fermented banchan
Green, red, or yellow curries, pad thai, pad kra pao, tom yum or tom kha soups; Thai basil, lime, sweet-salty-sour-spicy balance
Pho, bun cha, bun bo Hue, banh mi, goi cuon; fresh herbs, nuoc cham, crisp vegetables, light aromatic broths
Peri-peri grilled meats, bacalhau, caldo verde, bifana sandwiches; garlic, bay leaf, paprika, vinegar, seafood emphasis
Paella, tapas selections, tortilla española, gazpacho, hearty stews; olive oil, saffron, smoked paprika, seafood-forward plates
Less than 15 minutes hands-on
15 to 30 minutes hands-on
30 minutes to 1 hour build
1 hour plus or multi-step
Beginner-friendly steps
Multiple components but approachable
Advanced timing or techniques
High effort, presentation-focused
0 heat; suitable for sensitive palettes
Noticeable warmth but kid-friendly
Balanced heat for most adults
Bold chili presence
Significant burn; for spice lovers
1 serving meals for individuals
2 servings sized for two adults
4 servings covering a typical household
6 servings designed for big families
8 servings for extended family
No declared allergen avoidance; default tolerance
Contains milk or lactose ingredients
Contains eggs or egg products
Contains wheat/barley/rye gluten
Contains soybeans or soy derivatives
Contains peanuts or tree nuts
Contains finned fish or shellfish
Contains sesame seeds or oil
No targeted macro or calorie emphasis; default balanced meals
Meals optimized for high protein density per serving
Meals designed to stay within a ≤500–600 kcal per serving threshold
Meals moderate in carbohydrates without strict keto limits
Strict low-carbohydrate, high-fat macro profile for ketogenic diets
Meals intentionally low in total and saturated fat
Meals formulated to keep sodium levels lower than standard recipes
Meals containing elevated dietary fiber per serving
Requires oven baking or roasting
Has slow cooker or Instant Pot/pressure cooker
Uses air fryer basket
Needs microwave-safe cooking or reheating
Requires stove for boiling or pan cooking
Needs braai/grill access
Prefers meals made from baseline raw ingredients; sauces and components are cooked from scratch.
Prefers combining partially prepared or ready-to-cook items with simple scratch components.
Prefers fully prepared ready meals or heat-and-eat dishes, with minimal additional cooking.
